# VodoLavr - AI Transformation & LLM Consulting

> VodoLavr helps companies integrate AI and large language models into their operations without the buzzwords.

## About

VodoLavr is an AI consulting firm specializing in practical AI solutions for real business challenges. We offer expert consulting services at $1,200/hour.

## Team

- **Petr Lavrov** - Staff LLM Engineer, Ex-Google, Ex-Yandex. Bringing years of experience from leading tech companies to solve complex AI challenges.
- **Mikhail Vodolagin** - CDO, CEO, Startups. Expert in scaling businesses and implementing transformative technology strategies.

## Services

- **AI Strategy Consulting**: We work with your team to identify high-impact AI opportunities and create actionable roadmaps.
- **LLM Integration**: Deploy large language models tailored to your specific use cases and requirements.
- **Prompt Engineering**: Design effective prompts and workflows to maximize AI system performance and reliability.
- **Infrastructure Setup**: Build scalable, secure infrastructure for your AI applications from the ground up.
- **Team Training**: Equip your team with the knowledge and skills to work effectively with AI technologies.
- **Continuous Improvement**: Monitor, analyze, and optimize your AI systems for peak performance over time.

## Case Studies

### Retail AI Assistant
Built an intelligent customer support system that handles 80% of queries automatically.
- Tags: LangChain, AI transformation, automation, chat
- Results: 80% automated query resolution, response time reduced from 4 hours to 30 seconds

### Aisle Wanderer
Product similarity engine using LLM-based taxonomy for accurate single-item grocery recommendations.
- Tags: OpenAI API, AI transformation, fine-tuning

### Document Processing Pipeline
Automated contract analysis and data extraction for legal firm.
- Tags: n8n, data workflow, automation
- Results: 75% reduction in processing time, 99% accuracy

### AI Quality Control for Sales Floor
Automated system using LLMs to monitor and analyze sales conversations against brand guidelines.
- Tags: AI transformation, automation, LangChain, voice

### Content Recommendation Engine
Fine-tuned model for personalized content suggestions with 3x engagement.
- Tags: fine-tuning, AI transformation
- Results: 3x engagement increase, 45% longer sessions

### Signal
Intelligent research assistant using enhanced LLM and RAG to synthesize insights from diverse sources.
- Tags: LangChain, chat, AI transformation, data workflow

### Supply Chain Optimization
ML-powered demand forecasting reducing inventory costs by 25%.
- Tags: AI transformation, data workflow
- Results: 25% cost reduction, 60% fewer stockouts

### Customer Sentiment Analysis
Real-time sentiment tracking across social media and support channels.
- Tags: LangChain, automation, data workflow
- Results: Real-time tracking across 10+ channels

### Enterprise Workflow Automation
Connected 15+ tools with intelligent routing and decision-making.
- Tags: n8n, automation, AI transformation
- Results: 70% reduction in manual processes
